Sentencas: A spatially discretised thermo-electrochemical model is developed to calculate the temperature distribution in a tubular solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC).
Titulo: Thermo-mechanical stress in tubular solid oxide fuel cells: Part I - transient operating behaviour and the relevance of material creep

Sentencas: Model validation is accomplished based on the operating data from a demonstration plant.
Titulo: Thermo-mechanical stress in tubular solid oxide fuel cells: Part I - transient operating behaviour and the relevance of material creep

Sentencas: Using a mechanical model of the ceramic membrane-electrode assembly, the distribution of thermo-mechanical stress is calculated from the temperature profile.
Titulo: Thermo-mechanical stress in tubular solid oxide fuel cells: Part I - transient operating behaviour and the relevance of material creep

Sentencas: The resulting risk of fracture failure, being one of the crucial life-limiting factors of SOFC, is determined by means of Weibull analysis.
Titulo: Thermo-mechanical stress in tubular solid oxide fuel cells: Part I - transient operating behaviour and the relevance of material creep

Sentencas: The methodology and results are presented in two parts: Part I covers the dynamic operating properties of the SOFC and the time scale of material creep in its ceramic components.
Titulo: Thermo-mechanical stress in tubular solid oxide fuel cells: Part I - transient operating behaviour and the relevance of material creep

Sentencas: Part II deals with the risk of fracture failure related to transient operating scenarios, discusses its dependency on the operating conditions and derives a low-risk operating strategy.
Titulo: Thermo-mechanical stress in tubular solid oxide fuel cells: Part I - transient operating behaviour and the relevance of material creep

Sentencas: The dynamic operating behaviour is found to be dominated by the large thermal inertia of the solid cell components.
Titulo: Thermo-mechanical stress in tubular solid oxide fuel cells: Part I - transient operating behaviour and the relevance of material creep

Sentencas: An analysis of the creep relaxation indicates a significant relief of mechanical stress in the electrodes within a few hours of operation.
Titulo: Thermo-mechanical stress in tubular solid oxide fuel cells: Part I - transient operating behaviour and the relevance of material creep

Sentencas: This justifies a novel assumption regarding the stress-free state in the mechanical analysis of the fuel cell, which significantly increases the plausibility of the resulting risk of fracture failure.
Titulo: Thermo-mechanical stress in tubular solid oxide fuel cells: Part I - transient operating behaviour and the relevance of material creep
